about: This is an about page (i18n test) locales
calendar.prefix: This prefix is used to find all data points starting with the prefix name followed by -start-|-end-|-value- and a schedule number eg {schedule}-start-0.
calendar.error: An error has occurred while connecting to the server {server}.{status}
calendar.schedule.error: Failed to get the calendar, this might be caused by incorrect prefix settings or data-source that does not have a calendar.
calendar.globalCalendar: Global calendar, write to all data-sources
calendar.name: Name
calendar.invalidSettings: Please check your settings, some are invalid.
